TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResXResourceReader extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.IDisposable, class System.Resources.IResourceReader
type ResXResourceReader = class interface IResourceReader interface IEnumerable interface IDisposable

summary.span: 枚举 XML 资源 (.resx) 文件和流，并读取顺序资源名称和值对。

span.span: Enumerates XML resource (.resx) files and streams, and reads the sequential resource name and value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供 接口的默认实现，该实现读取 XML 格式的资源信息。The class provides a default implementation of the interface that reads resource information in an XML format. 若要从二进制资源格式读取资源信息，请使用 类。To read resource information from a binary resource format, use the class. 通过遍历 方法返回的字典枚举器（），可以使用 类枚举 .resx 文件中的资源。You use the class to enumerate resources in .resx files by traversing the dictionary enumerator () that is returned by the method. 调用 提供的方法来前进到下一个资源，并读取 .resx 文件中每个资源的名称和值。You call the methods provided by to advance to the next resource and to read the name and value of each resource in the .resx file. > [!NOTE] > 类提供两个枚举器。The class provides two enumerators. 方法返回 对象;建议使用此方法来枚举资源。The method returns an object; we recommend that you use this method to enumerate resources. 方法是返回 对象的显式接口实现;不建议使用。The method is an explicit interface implementation that returns an object; we do not recommend its use. 下面的示例使用 方法获取用于枚举 .resx 文件中的资源的 对象。The following example uses the method to obtain an object that is used to enumerate the resources in a .resx file. 该示例包含一个 `CreateResourceFile` 例程，用于创建必要的资源文件。The example includes a `CreateResourceFile` routine that creates the necessary resource file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/cs/resxresourcereader1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/vb/resxresourcereader1.vb#1)] 如果 `true` 属性， 属性的值为 对象，而不是资源值。If the property is `true`, the value of the property is a object rather than the resource value. 这会使资源项的注释在 属性中可用。This makes a resource item's comment available from the property. 下面的示例将 属性设置为 `true` 并枚举 .resx 文件中的资源。The following example sets the property to `true` and enumerates the resources in a .resx file, [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/cs/resxresourcereader2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/vb/resxresourcereader2.vb#2)] 如果 `true`，则枚举中的 项可以是：If is `true`, the items in the enumeration can be either: - 命名资源及其数据。Named resources along with their data. 在这种情况下，将 `null` 属性。In this case, the property is `null`. - 命名的资源以及包含资源数据的文件的名称。Named resources along with the name of the file that contains the resource data. 在这种情况下， 属性返回一个 对象，该对象提供有关资源的信息，包括其文件名。In this case, the property returns a object that provides information about the resource, including its filename. 如果使用了相对文件名，则应始终将 属性设置为提供相对文件路径的参考点。If relative file names are used, you should always set the property to provide a reference point for the relative file path. 如果要从 .resx 文件中检索命名资源而不是枚举其资源，可以实例化一个 对象并调用其 `GetString` 和 `GetObject` 方法。If you want to retrieve named resources from a .resx file rather than enumerating its resources, you can instantiate a object and call its `GetString` and `GetObject` methods. > [!NOTE] > 类在类级别包含应用于所有成员的链接要求和继承要求。The class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. 当直接调用方或派生类不具有完全信任权限时，将引发 异常。A exception is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 来循环访问 .resx 文件中的资源。The following example demonstrates how to use a to iterate through the resources in a .resx file. 首先，为文件 `items.resx`创建 `rsxr`。First, the `rsxr` is created for the file `items.resx`. 接下来，使用 方法来创建 ，以循环访问资源并将内容显示到控制台。Next, the method is used to create an to iterate through the resources and display the contents to the console. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CPP/resxresourcereader.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CS/resxresourcereader.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/VB/resxresourcereader.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BasePath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BasePath : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置在 对象中指定的相对文件路径的基路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the base path for the relative file path specified in a object.

value.span: 如果路径预置在 对象中指定的相对文件路径中，则该路径产生到资源文件的绝对路径。

span.span: A path that, if prepended to the relative file path specified in a object, yields an absolute path to a resource file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于解析分配给 对象的 属性的相对文件路径引用。The property is used to resolve relative file path references that are assigned to the property of objects. 默认情况下，其值为 ，相对文件路径引用将与 属性返回的当前目录进行解析。By default, its value is , and relative file path references are resolved in relationship to the current directory returned by the property. 在开始枚举资源之前，应设置此属性。You should set this property before you begin enumerating resources. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 XML 资源文件，其中包含狗猫的图像，同时还创建了一个字符串资源，用于指定创建该资源的应用程序。The following example creates an XML resource file that contains images of dog breeds, and also creates a string resource that specifies the application that created the resource. 对象用于存储图像的路径，而不是将二进制图像本身存储在资源文件中。 objects are used to store the path to the images rather than storing the binary images themselves in the resource file. 该示例将设置 属性，以便将图像文件名中的相对文件路径解释为名为 C:\data\\目录的子目录。The example sets the property so that the relative file paths in the images' file names are interpreted as subdirectories of a directory named C:\data\\. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.BasePath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.basepath/cs/basepathex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.BasePath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.basepath/vb/basepathex1.vb#1)] 请注意，必须添加对 System.web 的引用才能成功编译项目。Note that you must add a reference to System.Drawing.dll to compile the project successfully. 该示例还要求在名为 C:\data\images\\目录中存在必要的映像。The example also requires that the necessary images exist in a directory named C:\data\images\\.

exception.span: 在设置操作中无法指定值，因为 XML 资源文件已被访问且正在使用。

span.span: In a set operation, a value cannot be specified because the XML resource file has already been accessed and is in use.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed
abstract member Close : unit -> unit override this.Close : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 会启用 出于其他目的而重新分配的资源。Calling enables the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md). ## Examples 下面的示例在控制台中显示文件的资源，然后使用 方法关闭读取器并使其资源可用于其他进程。The following example displays the resources of a file to the console, and then uses the method to shut down the reader and to make its resources available for other processes. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CPP/resxresourcereader.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CS/resxresourcereader.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/VB/resxresourcereader.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可由 方法或 方法调用。This method can be called by either the method or the method. 在 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`时调用此方法。 invokes this method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 在将 `disposing` 设置为 `false`时调用此方法。 invokes this method with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 和有关可释放模式的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)、和 。

span.span: For more information about how to implement and about the disposable pattern, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md), , and .

summary.span: 此成员重写 方法。

span.span: This member overrides the method.

summary.span: 创建一个新 对象，然后将它初始化，以读取内容为 XML 资源文件格式的字符串。

span.span: Creates a new object and initializes it to read a string whose contents are in the form of an XML resource file.

param.name: fileContents
param.span: 一个字符串，它包含 XML 资源格式的信息。

span.span: A string containing XML resource-formatted information.

summary.span: 创建一个新 对象，然后将它初始化，以读取内容为 XML 资源文件格式的字符串。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator

summary.span: 返回当前 对象的一个枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator for the current object.

returns.span: 当前 对象的一个枚举数。

span.span: An enumerator for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索与当前 对象关联的 XML 资源（.resx）流或字符串中的名称/值对。The method retrieves the name/value pairs in the XML resource (.resx) stream or string associated with the current object. 但是，如果在调用 之前 属性设置为 `true`，则会将资源项作为 对象进行检索。However, if the property is set to `true` before you call , the resource items are retrieved as objects. 在这种情况下，将返回所有资源节点，而不考虑类型。In this case, all resource nodes are returned regardless of type. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法获取用于枚举 .resx 文件中的资源的 对象。The following example uses the method to obtain an object that is used to enumerate the resources in a .resx file. 该示例包含一个 `CreateResourceFile` 例程，用于创建必要的资源文件。The example includes a `CreateResourceFile` routine that creates the necessary resource file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/cs/resxresourcereader1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/vb/resxresourcereader1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator GetMetadataEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 提供一个字典枚举数，该枚举数可以从当前 XML 资源文件或流中检索设计时属性。

span.span: Provides a dictionary enumerator that can retrieve the design-time properties from the current XML resource file or stream.

returns.span: 资源的元数据的枚举数。

span.span: An enumerator for the metadata in a resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 资源以名称/值对的形式存储在资源文件或流中。Resources are stored as name/value pairs in a resource file or stream. 称为 "元数据" 的设计时属性与运行时数据资源一起存储在资源文件或流中。Design-time properties, which are called metadata, are stored in the resource file or stream along with runtime data resources. 方法提供一个 对象，该对象可从与当前 对象关联的资源文件或流中检索元数据。The method provides an object that can retrieve the metadata from the resource file or stream associated with the current object. 但是，如果在调用 之前 属性设置为 `true`，则不会检索任何资源节点。However, if the property is set to `true` before you call , no resource nodes are retrieved. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法遍历 XML 资源文件中的元数据资源。The following example uses the method to iterate through the metadata resources in an XML resource file. 此代码示例是为 属性提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CPP/useresxdatanodes.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CS/useresxdatanodes.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/VB/useresxdatanodes.vb#4)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 返回当前 对象的一个枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator for the current object.

summary.span: 有关此成员的说明，请参见 方法。

span.span: For a description of this member, see the method.

returns.span: 一个枚举器，可以循环访问与当前 对象关联的 XML 资源 (.resx) 流或字符串中的名称/值对。

span.span: An enumerator that can iterate through the name/value pairs in the XML resource (.resx) stream or string associated with the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 若要枚举 .resx 文件中的资源，建议调用 方法，然后对返回的 对象调用 `MoveNext` 方法。To enumerate the resources in a .resx file, we recommend that you call the method, and then call the `MoveNext` method on the returned object.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

summary.span: 有关此成员的说明，请参见 方法。

span.span: For a description of this member, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseResXDataNodes { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseResXDataNodes : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在读取当前 XML 资源文件或流时返回 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether objects are returned when reading the current XML resource file or stream.

value.span: 如果检索资源数据节点，则为 ；如果忽略资源数据节点，则为 。

span.span: if resource data nodes are retrieved; if resource data nodes are ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在开始枚举资源之前设置 属性。You can set the property before you begin enumerating resources. 默认情况下，其值为 `false`。By default, its value is `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举并显示 XML 文件中的资源项。The following example enumerates and displays resource items in an XML file. 最初， 设置为 `false`，以便在资源文件中出现数据和元数据项时显示它们。Initially, is set to `false` to show both data and metadata items as they occur in the resource file. 第二个枚举的 设置为 `true` 以便将资源数据元素作为 对象返回。The second enumeration has the set to `true` so that resource data elements are returned as objects. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CPP/useresxdatanodes.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CS/useresxdatanodes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/VB/useresxdatanodes.vb#2)] 该示例使用的资源 XML 文件包含一个数据节点和一个元数据节点。The resource XML file used by the example contains one data node and one metadata node. 若要在前面的示例中使用 XML 文件，请复制以下文本，并将其保存到名为 Resource1.resx 的文件中。To use the XML file with the previous example, copy the following text and save it to a file named Resource1.resx. ``` text/microsoft-resx 2.0 System.Resources.ResXResourceReader, System.Windows.Forms, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089 System.Resources.ResXResourceWriter, System.Windows.Forms, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089 Sample DATA value Sample METADATA value ```

exception.span: 在设置操作中，资源文件或流的枚举数已经打开。

span.span: In a set operation, the enumerator for the resource file or stream is already open.
